qas.question: When was the tide-predicting machine invented by Sir William Thomson invented?
Who invented the first tide-predicting machine in 1872?
What did Sir William Thomson's tide-predicting machine use to function?

context: The tide-predicting machine invented by <a1_0>Sir William Thomson<a1_0/> in <a0_0>1872<a0_0/> was of great utility to navigation in shallow waters. It used a <a2_0>system of pulleys and wires<a2_0/> to automatically calculate predicted tide levels for a set period at a particular location.
